page.title: 18TRADE-NURSERIES ROSE GREEN
page.content: Newlands Farm Nursery is an outlet for cut flowers which are,Astromerias, Freesia and Gladioli.They cross_breed the plants to find different coloured flowers.In the winter the glasshouses are heated by big boilers(the pressure is 100lbs per sq inch).The corms,when they finish flowering,are put into storage at above 10 degrees centigrade .The cold house is minus 3 degrees so that the two storage rooms are kept at their own special temperatures. Chalcroft Nursery has been in business for 50 years. Chalcroft and Manor Nurseries sell mainly shrubs,trees, roses,plants, pottery,flowers and vegetables.They are open 7 days a week 9.00am_5.30pm.
